notes: As an environmentally-committed retailer, Lowes offers a recycling center near store entrances to give consumers a free and easy way to properly dispose of rechargeable batteries, cell phones, CFLs and plastic shopping bags; materials that otherwise could be potentially harmful to the environment.  Look for the recycling center or ask a store associate for more details.

notes: Free, postage-paid Mail Back envelopes can be found on display in the lobby. There is no limit to the number of envelopes customers may take. The contents of the envelope must weigh less than 13 ounces and the envelope must be able to seal completely. For more details visitMaxBack."
